title: 🔴#1 HONEST(Unbiased) REVIEW of Redmi 4 [after using it for 2 weeks] [Full Review]
Same as redmi 3s prime with android 7.0
Five Stars
Five Stars
Four Stars
Five Stars
Four Stars
Best specs
Four Stars
Mobile is good, But this Phone is available at Bigbaazar @ ...
review:
🔴Kindly read the full Review if you are planning to buy Redmi 4  
●● If you want to get quick overview of the device, then read below else
scroll down for Detailed Review ●●  
👉PROS  
፨Good display  
፨Impressive camera performance  
፨Smooth performance  
👉CONS  
፨Android Marshmallow  
፨Nothing else!!  
🔴B.O.T'S OVERALL SCORE  
★Battery- 9.0  
★Display - 8.5  
★Camera - 8.3  
★Performance - 8.7  
★Software - 7.8  
★Design - 9.0  
●●FULL DETAILED REVIEW●●  
👉DESIGN  
፨Unibody metal construction  
፨Curved edges with a curved 2.5D glass on the front  
፨Compact form factor owing to the 5-inch display.  
፨Fits quite well in one’s palms and single-handed  
፨The build quality is excellent and it feels solid  
፨Matte black variant looks great(premium feel)  
👉DISPLAY  
፨5-inch HD display with a 1280 x 720 resolution.  
፨2.5D curved glass(similar to the Redmi Note 4)  
፨Toughened glass(no Gorilla Glass protection)  
፨Perfect balance(crisp and vivid display without the colors looking
oversaturated)  
👉PERFORMANCE  
፨Qualcomm Snapdragon 435 octa-core processor  
፨Clocked at 1.4GHz coupled with Adreno 505 GPU  
፨2 GB RAM16 ROM,3 GB RAM 32 GB, 4GB RAM 64 GB  
፨I haven’t really encountered any sluggishness or lags.  
፨Even while gaming, the phone did not get hot.  
፨4,100 mAh battery (A day and a half on a single charge is easily manageable
for most casual users)  
👉HARDWARE  
፨An IR blaster(use your phone as a remote control for several electronic
appliances at your home)  
፨Fingerprint scanner located at the back is quite good(can also be used to
take photos)  
፨The dual SIM smartphone features a hybrid slot  
፨Battery life is stellar(no fast charging support)  
👉CAMERA  
፨13MP rear camera with LED flash (great shots with good color reproduction and
sharpness)  
፨Outdoors in daylight, the phone really surprises with details it manages to
capture and overall clarity.  
፨Even the macro shots and close-up portraits turn out to be great.  
፨The PDAF works quite well and the camera focuses on subjects in a snap.  
፨In low light, the camera manages to click some decent shots, but there’s a
lot of noise in the pictures.  
፨Even indoors, the photos take a hit and are average at best.  
👉SELFIE CAMERA  
፨The 5-megapixel front-facing camera manages decent selfies that are good
enough for social sharing.  
Software  
፨MIUI 8 on top of Android 6.0.1 Marshmallow.  
፨MIUI 8 is one of the better Android skins out there and has a lot of fans.  
፨MIUI packs in several useful apps like FM radio, recorder, compass, torch,
and more.  
፨It(MIUI) is an intuitive interface packed with nifty little features
everywhere.  
🔴B.O.T'S VERDICT  
➽B.O.T'S SCORE - 4.6/5  
፨It’s a great package with solid chassis, Qualcomm’s newer chipset, decent
camera, and great battery life.  
፨The only shortcoming of the device is lack of Android Nougat out of the box.  
፨In all likelihood, Xiaomi’s got another winner on its hands in terms of
sales.  
፨If you’re planning to pick up a budget smartphone right now, it’s hard to
look further than Redmi 4.  
፨JUST GO FOR IT!!  
🔴Guys! My only request is please don’t dislike my review. If you have any
question or if you think I am wrong. Just ask me by commenting below.Please
hit YES Button if you found my review HELPFUL.Write reviews, help others,
happy shopping  
Thank You for reading this review.  
-●➽ Bhavesh B.O.T●-
